info.title: Ohana API
info.description:
API documentation for Ohana backend

Base URL: https://ikfwakanfh.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com

post.description: Registers a user with a phone number.
Creates a new user with an email and password.
Resends the confirmation code to the user's email address.
Confirms a user's email registration using the verification code.
Sends a reset password email to the user's email address.

message.example: Email sent with instructions to reset password.

post.description: Logs in a user with an email and password.
Signs in a user using Google Id Token.
